description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Lamb Cutlets with Garlicky Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Lamb Cutlets with Garlicky Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coriander leaves, chopped, plus extra leaves (to garnish)
1 lemon, juiced (plus lemon wedges, to serve)
1 long green chilli, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ginger, turmeric, coriander, chilli, juice and oil in a bowl. Lay cutlets in a baking tray and brush both sides with spice paste. Set aside for 15 minutes to marinate. Preheat a chargrill pan on high heat.
Meanwhile, combine yoghurt, garlic and chopped coriander. Season to taste. Grill cutlets for 3-4 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking.
Pile cutlets onto a serving platter and scatter with coriander leaves. Serve with garlicky yoghurt and lemon wedges.
